content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, nice to meet you. Let's negotiate the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: To start the negotiation, I believe the original asking price might be too high for my budget. Could we consider a reduction of around 10%?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I believe 10% reduction is too much. I am looking for the highest price possible.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understandably disappointed but respecting your decision, I will search for other accommodation options. TERMINATE
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran
